Subskills.name: Greater Slash
Subskills.description: Increases quickslash area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Plan Ahead
Subskills.description: Summon a shadow dashing towards your aim multiple times dealing damage to all monsters hit. After it expires you quickly dash following the same path with massively increased damage.

Subskills.name: Dual Hit
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of performed slashes.

Subskills.name: Exposed Weakness
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to stun the target.

Subskills.name: Top to Bottom
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using quickslash.

Subskills.name: Exploitation
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Spirit Double
Subskills.description: Summon shadow performing quickslash towards a nearby monster dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Now You See Me
Subskills.description: Slash with increased area of effect radius and damage dropping a smoke bomb at target location.

Subskills.name: Origin Point
Subskills.description: Leave a shadow behind slashing monsters around it dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Switch it Up
Subskills.description: Quickslash no longer deals damage in a circle and instead deals damage to the closest target and a cone behind them firing multiple piercing kunai.

Subskills.name: Multiplicative Duality
Subskills.description: Spirit double now spawns multiple shadows dashing with increased speed and damage.

Subskills.name: Mechanical Advantage
Subskills.description: Dash an increased range sending explosive kunai in an aura at your wake.
